node.doctext:
Knock knock

Who's there?

e2humour, an E2 usergroup dedicated to all things funny. There's a lot of poor, lonely, neglected, non-McFlurry related writeups on E2 that are quite funny. This is the place to shamelessly nodevertise them, and get some of that sweet, sweet noder lovin'. We're not so much the content rescue team as the content lightening-up team. It is also an opportunity to get your Message Inbox filled with dick jokes. /msg bol if you want in.

e2humour, an E2 usergroup dedicated to all things funny. There's a lot of poor, lonely, neglected, non-McFlurry related writeups on E2 that are quite funny. This is the place to shamelessly blah blah blah blah who?

Ah, grow up
node.title: e2humour
